login.accountVerification: 检查您的电子邮件并输入验证码

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: 使用免费帐户，您可以每月选择一款游戏进行跟踪。
selectGame.selectGameDesc2: 在下面选择您的第一个游戏！
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: 如果您犯了错误，请不要担心，您可以每月更改一次。

subscriptions.revokedAccess: 撤销对功能的访问权限

sendRequest.subject: 主题
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: 请随意请求游戏、报告错误或提出一些建议来帮助改进应用程序！

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: 步骤 1. 查找并添加您的 Steam ID
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: 要查找您的 Steam ID，请前往 Steam 并选择“查看个人资料”。
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: 您可以在个人资料顶部找到该 ID。
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: 步骤 2. 更新您的隐私偏好
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: 您还需要确保您的个人资料是公开的。
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: 您可以通过前往 Steam 偏好设置 -> 隐私设置来执行此操作

errors.checkCredentials: 请检查您的凭据并重试。
errors.googleSignInMsg: 获取此 Google 帐户的信息时出现问题。
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: 请通过您的 Steam 设置允许访问。
errors.steamAchievements: 无法获得该游戏的 Steam 成就。

alerts.changesLeft: 你将会拥有 {{changesLeft}} 改变{{s}} 左边。

screens.verifyAccount: Xác thực tài khoản của bạn

login.instructions1: Mật khẩu phải chứa ít nhất:
login.accountVerification: Kiểm tra email của bạn và nhập mã xác minh

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Với tài khoản Miễn phí, bạn có thể chọn một trò chơi mỗi tháng để theo dõi.
selectGame.selectGameDesc2: Chọn trò chơi đầu tiên của bạn dưới đây!
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Đừng lo lắng nếu bạn mắc lỗi, bạn sẽ có thể thay đổi điều này mỗi tháng một lần.

subscriptions.accessMultipleGames: Truy cập vào nhiều trò chơi
subscriptions.prerequisiteTracking: Theo dõi điều kiện tiên quyết tự động
subscriptions.accessPremiumFeatures: Truy cập vào các tính năng cao cấp
subscriptions.accessOneGame: Truy cập vào một trò chơi mỗi tháng
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Truy cập vào năm trò chơi mỗi tháng
subscriptions.accessAllGames: Truy cập vào tất cả các trò chơi
subscriptions.revokedAccess: Đã thu hồi quyền truy cập vào Tính năng

sendRequest.subject: Chủ thể
sendRequest.writeRequest: Viết yêu cầu của bạn ở đây...
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Vui lòng yêu cầu trò chơi, báo cáo lỗi hoặc đưa ra một số đề xuất để giúp cải thiện ứng dụng!

settings.changeAccountDetails: Thay đổi chi tiết tài khoản

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Bước 1. Tìm và thêm ID Steam của bạn
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Để tìm ID steam của bạn, hãy truy cập Steam và chọn 'Xem hồ sơ'.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Bạn có thể tìm thấy ID ở đầu hồ sơ của mình.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: Bước 2. Cập nhật tùy chọn quyền riêng tư của bạn
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Bạn cũng sẽ cần đảm bảo hồ sơ của bạn được công khai.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Bạn có thể thực hiện việc này bằng cách đi tới Tùy chọn Steam -> Cài đặt quyền riêng tư

errors.pleaseRefreshApp: Vui lòng làm mới ứng dụng
errors.checkCredentials: Vui lòng kiểm tra thông tin xác thực của bạn và thử lại.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Sự cố khi tải thông tin cho tài khoản google này.
errors.accountExistsMsg: Bạn có muốn liên kết các tài khoản này không?
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Vui lòng cho phép truy cập thông qua cài đặt Steam của bạn.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: Bạn không được phép sử dụng tài khoản này.
errors.steamAchievements: Không thể nhận được thành tích Steam cho trò chơi này.

alerts.changesLeft: Bạn sẽ có {{changesLeft}} thay đổi{{s}} bên trái.
alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Rất tiếc, bạn không còn thay đổi trò chơi nào trong tháng này.

witcher3.title: The Witcher 3: Cuộc săn hoang dã

login.accountVerification: E-postalarınızı kontrol edin ve doğrulama kodunu girin

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Ücretsiz bir hesapla, takip etmek için ayda bir oyun seçebilirsiniz.
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Hata yaparsanız endişelenmeyin, bunu ayda bir kez değiştirebileceksiniz.

sendRequest.subject: Ders
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Bir oyun talep etmekten, bir hatayı bildirmekten veya uygulamanın iyileştirilmesine yardımcı olacak bazı önerilerde bulunmaktan çekinmeyin!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: 1. Adım. Steam Kimliğinizi bulun ve ekleyin
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Steam kimliğinizi bulmak için Steam'e gidin ve 'Profili Görüntüle'yi seçin.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Ayrıca profilinizin herkese açık olduğundan da emin olmanız gerekir.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Bunu Steam Tercihleri ​​-> Gizlilik Ayarları'na giderek yapabilirsiniz.

errors.checkCredentials: Lütfen kimlik bilgilerinizi kontrol edip tekrar deneyin.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Bu Google hesabı için bilgi alınırken sorun oluştu.
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Lütfen Steam ayarlarınız üzerinden erişime izin verin.
errors.steamAchievements: Bu oyun için Steam başarımları alınamadı.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Üzgünüz, bu ay için oyun değişikliğiniz kalmadı.

login.instructions1: A senha deve conter pelo menos:
login.accountVerification: Verifique seus e-mails e insira o código de verificação

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Com uma conta gratuita, você pode selecionar um jogo por mês para acompanhar.
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Não se preocupe se cometer um erro, você poderá alterar isso uma vez por mês.

subscriptions.accessOneGame: Acesso a um jogo por mês
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Acesso a cinco jogos por mês

sendRequest.subject: Assunto
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Sinta-se à vontade para solicitar um jogo, reportar um bug ou fazer sugestões para ajudar a melhorar o app!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Passo 1. Encontre e adicione seu Steam ID
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Para encontrar seu ID Steam, acesse Steam e selecione ‘Ver perfil’.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Você pode encontrar o ID na parte superior do seu perfil.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: Passo 2. Atualize suas preferências de privacidade
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Você também precisará garantir que seu perfil seja público.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Você pode fazer isso acessando Preferências do Steam -> Configurações de privacidade

errors.checkCredentials: Verifique suas credenciais e tente novamente.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Problema ao obter informações desta conta do Google.
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Por favor, permita o acesso através das configurações do Steam.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: Você não está autorizado a usar esta conta.
errors.steamAchievements: Não foi possível obter conquistas do Steam para este jogo.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Desculpe, você não tem mais alterações no jogo para este mês.

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: ステップ 1. Steam ID を見つけて追加します
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Steam ID を確認するには、Steam に移動し、[プロフィールを表示] を選択します。
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: ID はプロフィールの上部にあります。
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: ステップ 2. プライバシー設定を更新する
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: また、プロフィールが公開されていることを確認する必要もあります。
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: これを行うには、「Steam 設定 -> プライバシー設定」に進みます。

dlc.heartsOfStone: ハーツ・オブ・ストーン

login.accountVerification: Controlla le tue email e inserisci il codice di verifica

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Con un account gratuito, puoi selezionare un gioco al mese da monitorare.
selectGame.selectGameDesc2: Seleziona il tuo primo gioco qui sotto!
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Non preoccuparti se commetti un errore, potrai modificarlo una volta al mese.

subscriptions.accessOneGame: Accesso a un gioco al mese
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Accesso a cinque giochi al mese

sendRequest.subject: Soggetto
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Sentiti libero di richiedere un gioco, segnalare un bug o dare qualche suggerimento per contribuire a migliorare l'app!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Passaggio 1. Trova e aggiungi il tuo ID Steam
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Per trovare il tuo ID Steam, vai su Steam e seleziona "Visualizza profilo".
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Puoi trovare l'ID nella parte superiore del tuo profilo.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: Passaggio 2. Aggiorna le tue preferenze sulla privacy
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Dovrai anche assicurarti che il tuo profilo sia pubblico.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Puoi farlo andando su Preferenze di Steam -> Impostazioni sulla privacy

errors.checkCredentials: Controlla le tue credenziali e riprova.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Problema nel reperire informazioni per questo account Google.
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Consenti l'accesso tramite le impostazioni di Steam.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: Non sei autorizzato a utilizzare questo account.
errors.steamAchievements: Impossibile ottenere risultati Steam per questo gioco.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Siamo spiacenti, non sono rimaste modifiche al gioco per questo mese.

login.accountVerification: Periksa email Anda dan masukkan kode verifikasi

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Dengan akun Gratis, Anda dapat memilih satu game per bulan untuk dilacak.
selectGame.selectGameDesc2: Pilih game pertama Anda di bawah ini!
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Jangan khawatir jika Anda melakukan kesalahan, Anda dapat mengubahnya sebulan sekali.

subscriptions.accessOneGame: Akses ke satu game per bulan
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Akses ke lima game per bulan

sendRequest.subject: Subjek
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Jangan ragu untuk meminta permainan, melaporkan bug, atau memberikan beberapa saran untuk membantu meningkatkan aplikasi!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Langkah 1. Temukan dan tambahkan ID Steam Anda
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Untuk menemukan ID steam Anda, buka Steam dan pilih 'Lihat Profil'.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Anda dapat menemukan ID di bagian atas profil Anda.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Anda juga perlu memastikan profil Anda bersifat publik.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Anda dapat melakukan ini dengan menuju ke Steam Preferences -> Privacy Settings

errors.checkCredentials: Silakan periksa kredensial Anda dan coba lagi.
errors.googleSignIn: Terjadi kesalahan saat Masuk dengan Google
errors.googleSignInMsg: Terjadi masalah saat mendapatkan info untuk akun Google ini.
errors.accountExistsMsg: Apakah Anda ingin menautkan akun ini?
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Harap izinkan akses melalui pengaturan Steam Anda.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: Anda tidak sah untuk menggunakan akun ini.
errors.steamAchievements: Tidak bisa mendapatkan pencapaian uap untuk game ini.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Maaf, tidak ada perubahan permainan tersisa untuk bulan ini.

login.instructions1: पासवर्ड में कम से कम ये होना चाहिए:
login.accountVerification: अपने ईमेल जांचें और सत्यापन कोड दर्ज करें

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: निःशुल्क खाते के साथ, आप ट्रैक करने के लिए प्रति माह एक गेम का चयन कर सकते हैं।
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: अगर आपसे कोई गलती हो जाए तो चिंता न करें, आप इसे महीने में एक बार बदल सकेंगे।

subscriptions.accessOneGame: प्रति माह एक गेम तक पहुंच
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: प्रति माह पांच खेलों तक पहुंच
subscriptions.revokedAccess: सुविधाओं तक पहुंच रद्द कर दी गई

sendRequest.subject: विषय
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: बेझिझक किसी गेम के लिए अनुरोध करें, बग की रिपोर्ट करें या ऐप को बेहतर बनाने में मदद के लिए कुछ सुझाव दें!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: चरण 1. अपनी स्टीम आईडी ढूंढें और जोड़ें
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: अपनी स्टीम आईडी ढूंढने के लिए, स्टीम पर जाएं और 'प्रोफ़ाइल देखें' चुनें।
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: आप आईडी को अपनी प्रोफ़ाइल के शीर्ष पर पा सकते हैं।
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: चरण 2. अपनी गोपनीयता प्राथमिकताएँ अद्यतन करें
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: आपको यह भी सुनिश्चित करना होगा कि आपकी प्रोफ़ाइल सार्वजनिक है।
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: आप स्टीम प्रीफ़ेंस -> गोपनीयता सेटिंग्स पर जाकर ऐसा कर सकते हैं

errors.emailAlreadyExists: ईमेल पहले से ही मौजूद है
errors.checkCredentials: कृपया अपनी साख जांचें और पुनः प्रयास करें।
errors.googleSignInMsg: इस Google खाते की जानकारी प्राप्त करने में समस्या.
errors.accountExistsMsg: क्या आप इन खातों को लिंक करना चाहेंगे?
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: कृपया अपनी स्टीम सेटिंग्स के माध्यम से पहुंच की अनुमति दें।
errors.unauthorizedMsg: आप इस खाते का उपयोग करने के लिए अनधिकृत हैं.
errors.steamAchievements: इस गेम के लिए स्टीम उपलब्धियां नहीं मिल सकीं.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: क्षमा करें, आपके पास इस महीने के लिए कोई गेम परिवर्तन नहीं बचा है।

login.instructions1: Le mot de passe doit contenir au moins :
login.accountVerification: Vérifiez vos e-mails et entrez le code de vérification

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Avec un compte gratuit, vous pouvez sélectionner un jeu par mois à suivre.
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Ne vous inquiétez pas si vous faites une erreur, vous pourrez changer cela une fois par mois.

subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Accès à cinq jeux par mois

sendRequest.subject: Sujet
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: N'hésitez pas à demander un jeu, signaler un bug ou faire des suggestions pour améliorer l'application !

accountDetails.updateDetails: Détails de la mise à jour

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Étape 1. Recherchez et ajoutez votre identifiant Steam
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Pour trouver votre identifiant Steam, rendez-vous sur Steam et sélectionnez « Afficher le profil ».
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Vous pouvez trouver l’identifiant en haut de votre profil.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: Étape 2. Mettez à jour vos préférences de confidentialité
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Vous devrez également vous assurer que votre profil est public.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Vous pouvez le faire en vous rendant dans Préférences Steam -> Paramètres de confidentialité.

errors.checkCredentials: Veuillez vérifier vos informations d'identification et réessayer.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Problème pour obtenir des informations sur ce compte Google.
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Veuillez autoriser l'accès via vos paramètres Steam.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à utiliser ce compte.
errors.steamAchievements: Impossible d'obtenir les succès Steam pour ce jeu.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Désolé, vous n'avez plus aucune modification de jeu pour ce mois-ci.

login.instructions1: La contraseña debe contener al menos:
login.accountVerification: Revisa tus correos electrónicos e ingresa el código de verificación

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Con una cuenta gratuita, puedes seleccionar un juego por mes para realizar el seguimiento.
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: No te preocupes si cometes un error, podrás cambiar esto una vez al mes.

subscriptions.accessSteam: Accede a los logros de Steam.

subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Acceso a cinco juegos por mes

sendRequest.subject: Sujeto
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: ¡No dudes en solicitar un juego, informar un error o hacer algunas sugerencias para ayudar a mejorar la aplicación!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Paso 1. Encuentra y agrega tu ID de Steam
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Para encontrar tu ID de Steam, dirígete a Steam y selecciona "Ver perfil".
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Puedes encontrar la identificación en la parte superior de tu perfil.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: Paso 2. Actualice sus preferencias de privacidad
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: También deberá asegurarse de que su perfil sea público.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Puedes hacerlo dirigiéndote a Preferencias de Steam -> Configuración de privacidad

errors.checkCredentials: Por favor verifique sus credenciales e inténtelo nuevamente.
errors.googleSignIn: Error al iniciar sesión en Google
errors.googleSignInMsg: Problema para obtener información para esta cuenta de Google.
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Permita el acceso a través de la configuración de Steam.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: No está autorizado a utilizar esta cuenta.
errors.steamAchievements: No se pudieron obtener logros de Steam para este juego.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Lo sentimos, no te quedan cambios de juego para este mes.

auth.forgotPwDesc: Enter the email you signed up with and your new password.
auth.resetPw: Enter this code to reset your password
auth.linkAccountDesc: Enter this code to link your accounts

login.instructions2:
• 8 characters 
• 1 uppercase letter
• 1 lowercase letter
• 1 numerical value
login.accountVerification: Check your emails and enter the verification code

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: With a Free account, you can select one game per month to track.
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Don't worry if you make a mistake, you'll be able to change this once per month.

subscriptions.subscriptionDesc:
With a Premium subscription,
you will gain access to Premium Features such as:
subscriptions.accessOneGame: Access to one game per month
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Access to five games per month

sendRequest.subject: Subject
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Feel free to request a game, report a bug or make some suggestions to help improve the app!
sendRequest.verifyAccount:
Hello,
You have recently created an account with Completionist.
To verify your account, please enter the following code in the application:

{{code}}

accountDetails.invalidUserName: Please ensure Username has at least 1 character.
accountDetails.invalidUserEmail: Please ensure you are using a valid email.

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Step 1. Find and add your Steam ID
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: To find your steam ID, head to Steam and select 'View Profile'.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: You can find the ID at the top of your profile. It will look like:
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: You will also need to ensure your profile is public.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: You can do this by heading to Steam Prefences -> Privacy Settings

errors.incorrectCodeDesc: The code you have entered is incorrect. Please try again.
errors.checkCredentials: Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Problem getting info for this google account.
errors.accountExistsMsg: Would you like to link these accounts?
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Please allow access through your Steam settings.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: You are unauthorized to use this account. Please try logging in again.
errors.steamAchievements: Could not get steam achievements for this game.
errors.differentEmail: Please use a different email address.
errors.linkedWithGoogle:
This email is already linked through Google. 
If you would like to sign in with a regular password, login with this email and set your desired password.
errors.linkedWithRegular:
This email is already linked. 
If you would like to link your Google account, login through the Google Sign In using this email.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage:
Sorry, you have no game changes left for this month.
 Please upgrade to a premium subscription, or wait until the 1st of next month.

login.instructions1: Das Passwort muss mindestens Folgendes enthalten:
login.accountVerification: Überprüfen Sie Ihre E-Mails und geben Sie den Bestätigungscode ein

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: Mit einem kostenlosen Konto können Sie ein Spiel pro Monat zum Verfolgen auswählen.
selectGame.selectGameDesc2: Wählen Sie unten Ihr erstes Spiel aus!
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: Machen Sie sich keine Sorgen, wenn Sie einen Fehler machen. Sie können dies einmal im Monat ändern.

subscriptions.accessOneGame: Zugriff auf ein Spiel pro Monat
subscriptions.accessFiveGames: Zugriff auf fünf Spiele pro Monat

sendRequest.subject: Thema
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: Fordern Sie gerne ein Spiel an, melden Sie einen Fehler oder machen Sie Vorschläge zur Verbesserung der App!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: Schritt 1. Suchen Sie Ihre Steam-ID und fügen Sie sie hinzu
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: Um Ihre Steam-ID zu finden, gehen Sie zu Steam und wählen Sie „Profil anzeigen“.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: Die ID finden Sie oben in Ihrem Profil.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: Sie müssen außerdem sicherstellen, dass Ihr Profil öffentlich ist.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: Sie können dies tun, indem Sie zu Steam-Einstellungen -> Datenschutzeinstellungen gehen

errors.checkCredentials: Bitte überprüfen Sie Ihre Anmeldedaten und versuchen Sie es erneut.
errors.googleSignInMsg: Beim Abrufen der Informationen für dieses Google-Konto ist ein Problem aufgetreten.
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: Bitte erlauben Sie den Zugriff über Ihre Steam-Einstellungen.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: Sie sind nicht berechtigt, dieses Konto zu verwenden.
errors.steamAchievements: Für dieses Spiel konnten keine Steam-Erfolge erzielt werden.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: Leider haben Sie für diesen Monat keine Spieländerungen mehr übrig.

login.instructions1: يجب أن تحتوي كلمة المرور على الأقل على:
login.accountVerification: تحقق من رسائل البريد الإلكتروني الخاصة بك وأدخل رمز التحقق

selectGame.selectGameDesc1: باستخدام الحساب المجاني، يمكنك اختيار لعبة واحدة كل شهر لتتبعها.
selectGame.selectGameDesc3: لا تقلق إذا ارتكبت أي خطأ، فستتمكن من تغيير هذا مرة واحدة شهريًا.

subscriptions.accessOneGame: إمكانية الوصول إلى لعبة واحدة شهريًا

sendRequest.subject: موضوع
sendRequest.requestGameDesc: لا تتردد في طلب لعبة أو الإبلاغ عن خطأ أو تقديم بعض الاقتراحات للمساعدة في تحسين التطبيق!

steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep1: الخطوة 1. ابحث عن معرف Steam الخاص بك وأضفه
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc1: للعثور على معرف Steam الخاص بك، توجه إلى Steam وحدد "عرض الملف الشخصي".
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc2: يمكنك العثور على المعرف في الجزء العلوي من ملفك الشخصي.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdStep2: الخطوة 2. قم بتحديث تفضيلات الخصوصية الخاصة بك
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc3: ستحتاج أيضًا إلى التأكد من أن ملفك الشخصي عام.
steamAchievements.addSteamIdDesc4: يمكنك القيام بذلك عن طريق التوجه إلى تفضيلات Steam -> إعدادات الخصوصية

errors.checkCredentials: يرجى التحقق من بيانات الاعتماد الخاصة بك وحاول مرة أخرى.
errors.googleSignIn: حدث خطأ أثناء تسجيل الدخول إلى Google
errors.googleSignInMsg: حدثت مشكلة أثناء الحصول على معلومات لحساب Google هذا.
errors.accountExistsMsg: هل ترغب في ربط هذه الحسابات؟
errors.permissionDeniedMsg: يرجى السماح بالوصول من خلال إعدادات Steam الخاصة بك.
errors.unauthorizedMsg: أنت غير مصرح لك باستخدام هذا الحساب.
errors.steamAchievements: لا يمكن الحصول على إنجازات البخار لهذه اللعبة.

alerts.noChangesLeftMessage: عذرًا، لم يتبق لديك أي تغييرات في اللعبة لهذا الشهر.
